description: Extract a sub-region from an image using the bounding box from a label image, with an optional padding radius.

input_image.title: Input Image
input_image.description: The input image from which a region will be extracted.

output_image.title: Output Image
output_image.description: The output image containing the extracted region.

label_mask_image.title: Label Mask Image
label_mask_image.description: The label mask image used to extract the bounding box.

label.title: Label
label.description: The label value used to extract the sub-region.

pad_radius.title: Pad Radius
pad_radius.description: Optional padding radius to be added around the bounding box.
